name: Restaurant Empire
description:
Starting with nothing except some cash and a passion for food, build a restaurant from the bottom up - hire waiters, decorate, even cook the meals! Buy, build, outsell and underprice your competition.    

Will you use your culinary wizardry to out-cook chefs? What tactics and strategies will you employ to buy out the competition? You decide. With a combination of business strategy and role-playing game styles plus a free-form sandbox game mode, three huge cities, and over 30 playable chefs and a host of locations to travel to, Restaurant Empire is an epicurean delight of gastronomic proportions!Tycoon-style gameplay focused around managing a restaurant chain Countless sliders and spreadsheets that let you control the minutiae of running a restaurant You can change everything - from the staff and decor all the way to the font used in the menu
